name: gluttony

effect.diamond-pearl: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
effect.platinum: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.

short_effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
flavor_text.platinum: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
